name: Kafka Trigger
semantic_context: Consume messages from a Kafka topic
natural_language_description: 这是 Kafka Trigger 节点。主要用于: Consume messages from a Kafka topic

topic.name: topic
topic.description: Name of the queue of topic to consume from
topic.natural_language_description: 参数名: Topic | 作用: Name of the queue of topic to consume from | (必填项)

groupId.name: groupId
groupId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group ID | 作用: ID of the consumer group | (必填项)

useSchemaRegistry.name: useSchemaRegistry
useSchemaRegistry.description: Whether to use Confluent Schema Registry
useSchemaRegistry.natural_language_description: 参数名: Use Schema Registry | 作用: Whether to use Confluent Schema Registry | 默认值: False

schemaRegistryUrl.name: schemaRegistryUrl
schemaRegistryUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schema Registry URL | 作用: URL of the schema registry | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowAutoTopicCreation (值: None) - Whether to allow sending message to a previously non exisiting topic
autoCommitThreshold (值: None) - The consumer will commit offsets after resolving a given number of messages
autoCommitInterval (值: None) - The consumer will commit offsets after a given period, for example, five seconds
heartbeatInterval (值: None) - Heartbeats are used to ensure that the consumer's session stays active
maxInFlightRequests (值: None) - The maximum number of unacknowledged requests the client will send on a single connection
fromBeginning (值: None) - Whether to read message from beginning
jsonParseMessage (值: None) - Whether to try to parse the message to an object
parallelProcessing (值: None) - Whether to process messages in parallel or by keeping the message in order
onlyMessage (值: None) - Whether to return only the message property
returnHeaders (值: None) - Whether to return the headers received from Kafka
sessionTimeout (值: None) - The time to await a response in ms
